description:
Unravel the swamp's mysteries in "Survival Float Simulator - Crocodile Waters Craft, Raft, Build"! Craft your haven from its bounty, transforming a makeshift raft into a thriving sanctuary. Embrace the challenge – murky waters, tangled vegetation, and an untamed beauty await your resourceful spirit.

Features:
- Craft Your Survival: Transform raw swamp resources into tools, structures, and ingenious upgrades for your raft.
- Master the Hook: Snag supplies and evade lurking dangers with your trusty grappling hook.
- Fish & Feast: Reel in sustenance from the swamp's depths and cook delicious meals to fuel your journey.
- Purify for Life: Craft innovative filtration systems to turn murky water into clean, drinkable water.
- Beware the Crocs: Defend your raft against the swamp's apex predators – the ferocious crocodiles.
- Build Your Sanctuary: Personalize your raft with decorative touches, transforming it into a comfortable haven.
- Expand & Fortify: Strengthen and expand your raft, unlocking new technologies for better survival odds.
Embark on a mesmerizing odyssey into the heart of the "Survival Float Simulator - Crocodile Waters Craft, Raft, Build" and discover the true depths of your resilience in the face of nature's untamed fury.
name: Survival Float Simulator - Crocodile Waters Craft, Raft, Build
intro: Survive on the Raft Conquer the Swamp, Beware the Crocodile
